title: US, Canadian officials talk combatting guns, drugs at cross border crime forum
description: U.S, Canada talk combatting guns, drugs at cross border crime forum.

title: Army orders stand-down of helicopter units following 2 deadly crashes
description: The Army has ordered all of its helicopters to put in place a 24-hour safety stand-down following two deadly crashes that have killed 12 soldiers in the last 30 days.

title: Climate change activists plan protest at White House Correspondents' Dinner
description: Activists say they will protest at the upcoming White House Correspondents Dinner on Saturday to demand the end of fossil fuel extraction on public lands.

title: Biden's age a target for critics, issue for voters as he kicks off campaign: ANALYSIS
description: He's been dogged by questions as he kicks off his 2024 run for reelection.

title: Pro-DeSantis PAC targets Trump voters with 'Winner' ad in early primary states
description: The super PAC supporting Florida GOP Gov. Ron DeSantis' expected 2024 presidential run is set to with a new TV ad targeting Trump voters.

title: WATCH:  Fog rolls over San Francisco
description: Stunning timelapse shows the Golden Gate Bridge wreathed in a gentle fog.

title: China's Mars rover finds signs of recent water in sand dunes
description: A new study suggests water on Mars may be more widespread and recent than previously thought

title: Greener pastures? 2,500 hopeful sheep cross Idaho highway
description: It's not unusual in Idaho to see a herd of sheep bleating as ranchers move them to higher elevation

title: Bill allows DeSantis to run for president while governor
description: Republican Ron DeSantis would not have to resign as Florida governor in order to run for president if he chooses under a bill given final approval in by the GOP-dominated state Legislature

title: Police: Teacher grazed when gun discharges in classroom
description: Police say a Tennessee teacher was grazed when a gun discharged in a high school classroom Friday, but no other injuries were reported

title: Biden declares Fort Lauderdale disaster area after flooding
description: President Joe Biden has declared part of South Florida a disaster area after record flooding struck the area earlier this month

title: EPA allows gasoline with higher ethanol blend during summer
description: Fuel stations throughout the country will be able to sell gasoline blended with 15% ethanol during the summer under an emergency waiver issued by the Environmental Protection Agency

title: US agency raises 'serious concerns' about tech visa lottery
description: U.S. authorities say the number of applications for visas used in the technology industry soared for a second straight year, raising “serious concerns” that some people are manipulating the system to gain an unfair advantage

title: Andy Warhol portrait of OJ Simpson goes on auction block
description: An Andy Warhol silkscreen portrait of O.J. Simpson is going up for auction

title: Police say man continued date after fatal shooting over $40
description: Authorities say a Texas man paused his dinner date to fatally shoot an individual who had allegedly posed as a parking attendant and scammed him out of $40

title: Colorado governor signs gun control bills after massacre
description: Colorado’s governor has signed four gun control bills months after a mass shooting at an LGBTQ nightclub

title: Federal Reserve says it 'failed' in run up to Silicon Valley Bank collapse
description: "Supervisors failed to take forceful enough action,” the Federal Reserve report said.

title: Utah judge to consider challenge to new abortion clinic ban
description: A Utah court on Friday will consider a request from Planned Parenthood to delay implementing a statewide ban on abortion clinics set to begin taking effect next week

title: 4 teens arrested in connection to after-prom party shooting that wounded 11
description: Four teenagers have been arrested in the wake of a shooting that injured 11 people at an after-prom party at a home in Texas, authorities announced on Friday.

title: What to know about bill that aims to regulate paid influencers in France
description: France could become the first country in Europe to regulate influencer marketing, cracking down on what people can monetize and promote online.

title: What GDP is and why it matters
description: While imperfect, GDP carries major real-world implications, experts said.

title: A key inflation gauge tracked by Fed remained high in March
description: A key index of underlying inflation that is closely followed by the Federal Reserve remained elevated last month, keeping the Fed on track to raise interest rates next week for the 10th time since March of last year

title: Corden addresses divided America in final 'Late Late Show'
description: James Corden bid farewell Thursday to his late-night CBS talk show “The Late Late Show with James Corden" after eight seasons

title: Error, confusion plague review kicking millions off Medicaid
description: Some Medicaid recipients tell The Associated Press errors and confusion are leading to them being kicked off the federally and state-funded health coverage program

title: Who are the lawyers working with special counsel Jack Smith?
description: AG Merrick Garland tapped Smith to look into Donald Trump's actions on Jan. 6.

title: Indian police to probe sexual abuse charge against official
description: Indian police will investigate allegations of sexual harassment against the president of the wrestling federation leveled by some young female athletes who are holding a week-long sit-in protest near the parliament building in New Delhi

title: BBC chief quits amid furor over role in Boris Johnson loan
description: The chairman of the BBC has resigned after a report found he failed to disclose a potential conflict of interest over his role in arranging a loan more than two years ago for Boris Johnson

title: Fed's review of role in Silicon Valley Bank collapse due out
description: The Federal Reserve is scheduled Friday to release a highly-anticipated review of its supervision of Silicon Valley Bank, the go-to bank for venture capital firms and technology start-ups that failed spectacularly in March, setting off a crisis of conf...

title: Dutch court bans sperm donor who fathered at least 550
description: A Dutch court has banned a man from donating any more of his sperm after he fathered at least 550 children in the Netherlands and other countries and misled prospective parents about the number of offspring he helped to conceive

title: French actor Eva Green wins $1M in spat over 'B movie'
description: French actor Eva Green has been awarded $1 million by a British court in her dispute over the collapse of a project she feared was destined to become a “B movie” that could ruin her career

title: Amid Ukraine war, pope to give vision for Europe in Hungary
description: Pope Francis will be outlining his vision for the future of Europe during a three-day visit to Hungary

title: NYC transit agency ends Twitter alerts, says it's unreliable
description: New York City's Metropolitan Transit Agency, which for 14 years has provided real-time information on subway, train and bus service outages, delays and other important updates for its 1.3 million followers, will stop using Twitter for such alerts

title: District tries to dismiss lawsuit from teacher shot by 6-year-old
description: The Newport News School board filed a motion to dismiss the $40 million lawsuit filed by a first-grade teacher who was shot in her classroom by a 6-year-old student.

title: 3 dead, 1 injured after 2 US Army helicopters crash during training flight in Alaska
description: Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson said two AH-64 Apache helicopters returning from a training mission collided and crashed near Healy.

title: 9 still missing after boat sinks in west Indonesia, 11 dead
description: Rescuers are searching for nine people missing in rough seas after a speedboat carrying at least 78 people sank in western Indonesia

title: NY judges will get more power in setting bail, governor says
description: Judges in New York will be getting more discretion to jail people awaiting trial

title: WATCH:  7th grader stops school bus after driver passes out
description: A Michigan school district released school bus video showing seventh grader Dillon Reeves take the wheel and help to stop the bus after the driver suffered a medical emergency.

title: Escaped Mississippi detainee captured in Texas nearly a week later, sheriff says
description: A detainee who escaped from a Mississippi jail along with three other men nearly a week ago has been detained in Texas, authorities said Thursday.
